BattleEffectText.Name: Bloody Tear
BattleEffectText.Desc: All characters do not lose Bleed stacks after rolling Offensive dice for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burning Tear
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenver a character takes Burn damage this Scene, all allies of that character take that damage too.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rotting Tear
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Power Increase effects are applied as Power Decrease effects for this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Melting Tear
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Protection's damage reduction effect is applied as damage increase effect for this Scene. When characters are hit, they take damage equal to Protection on them.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth - Asiyah
BattleEffectText.Desc: Force clashes. Pages targeting this character cannot be removed from the Speed dice. Pages targeted by this character have their target changed to a random Speed die of their target.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth - Asiyah
BattleEffectText.Desc: Pages targeting this character cannot be removed from the Speed dice. Pages targeted by this character have their target changed to a random Speed die of their target.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth - Briah
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can clash only if the opponent's Speed is lower.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth - Atziluth
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can clash only with the pages of the same Type (Melee/Ranged/Special).

BattleEffectText.Name: Malkuth
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Whenever a librarian uses a page, increase the Cost of all copies of that page by 1 for the next Scene.
Destruction Condition: Dice in this Speed die lose 5 times in a clash against pages whose original Cost is 2 or lower (Progress: {0}/5)

BattleEffectText.Name: Yesod
BattleEffectText.Desc:
"Endured" resistances of all librarians are changed to "Weak".
Destruction Condition: Take 50 or more damage of the type this character is "Endured" to (Progress: {0}/50)

BattleEffectText.Name: Hod
Netzach
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Recovery effects of all librarians are reduced by {0}%. (10% for every hit taken by this Speed die in the previous Scene) If the reduction is higher than 100%, they take damage instead.
Destruction Condition: Take 50 or more damage in a single Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Tiphereth
Gebura
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Double the Power of the first die rolled by this character in a Scene. (Does not include responding to librarians' Mass Attacks)
Destruction Condition: Lose a clash against a die that has +10 or more Power

BattleEffectText.Name: Binah
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Become unable to be inflicted with status ailments, and take half as much damage from non-attacks.
Destruction Condition: Lose 5 clashes against dice unaffected by Power gain or loss (Progress: {0}/5)

BattleEffectText.Name: Hokma
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Dice on the last page used by this character in a Scene gain '[On Hit] Deal damage equal to (Dice value)% of target's HP'
Destruction Condition: Take 150 or more damage from a single die targeting this Speed die (Including damage from the ability of that die)

BattleEffectText.Name: Keter
BattleEffectText.Desc:
This Speed die cannot be targetted.
If HP is higher than 1 at the start of the Scene, recover HP to 500.
Destruction Condition: Destroy all other Sephirah dice (Progress: {0}/9)

BattleEffectText.Name: Power Down
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice Power -{0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Deterrence
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increases by 1 upon winning a clash. Decreases by 1 upon losing a clash. Increases by 20 on kill. Decreases by 10 upon becoming Staggered. If this character has the highest Deterrence among allies, all enemies will target this character at the start of the next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Deterrence
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increases upon winning a clash or on kill, reduces upon losing a clash or becoming Staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Asiyah
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice on all pages in deck of this character are changed to Offensive. On a successful hit, ignore target's resistances.

BattleEffectText.Name: Yetzirah
BattleEffectText.Desc: This effect affects all allies. Boost the minimum roll value of all dice to the middle value of the original dice roll values.

BattleEffectText.Name: Briah
BattleEffectText.Desc: This effect affects all allies. On a successful hit, recover HP equal to 30% of damage dealt.

BattleEffectText.Name: Resonance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Activate addtional effects on combat start if there are other pages with [Resonance] effect being used.

BattleEffectText.Name: Asiyah
BattleEffectText.Desc: Defensive dice on all pages in deck of this character are changed to Offensive. On a successful hit, ignore target's resistances.

BattleEffectText.Name: Yetzirah
BattleEffectText.Desc: This effect affects all allies. Boost the minimum roll value of all dice to the middle value of the original dice roll values.

BattleEffectText.Name: Briah
BattleEffectText.Desc: This effect affects all allies. On a successful hit, recover HP equal to 30% of damage dealt.

BattleEffectText.Name: Amplification
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal and take {0}% more damage and become unaffected by Power Reduction effects.

BattleEffectText.Name: Amplification
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal and take more damage and become unaffected by Power Reduction effects.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fate
BattleEffectText.Desc:
Increases by 1 at the start of each Scene and every time the sum of rolls of dice rolled by this character reaches 13.
Current sum: {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Fate
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increases by 1 at the start of each Scene and every time the sum of rolls of dice rolled by this character reaches 13. Take {0}% more damage and Stagger damage. (Up to 50%, including damage from non-attacks)

BattleEffectText.Name: Fate
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increases by 1 at the start of each Scene and every time the sum of rolls of dice rolled by this character reaches 13. Take more damage and Stagger damage. (1% per 1 stack, Up to 50%, including damage from non-attacks)

BattleEffectText.Name: Cannot Win Clashes
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Counter dice from this page always lose in a clash, but recycle regardless of the outcome of a clash.

BattleEffectText.Name: Deflect Nullify
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Counter dice from this page, upon losing a clash, nullify incoming deflect damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Binah's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of An Arbiter's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Incomplete Angela's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Angela's Incomplete Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Hokma's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of A Recordkeeper's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Counter
BattleEffectText.Desc: Value can be less than 0. And depending on whether it exceeds 0, Qliphoth Deterrence will be either in either <color=#00ff00>Stable</color> or <color=#ff0000>Overload</color> state.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Deterrence - <color=#00ff00>Stable</color>
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon becoming Staggered, lose all stacks of Qliphoth Counter.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Deterrence - <color=#ff0000>Overload</color>
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, take Stagger damage equal to 2.5x Qliphoth Counter. If Staggered, do not recover from it until Qliphoth Counter becomes 1 or higher.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Meltdown - Dawn (Enemy)
BattleEffectText.Desc: Decreases by 1 upon losing a clash and when hit, increases by 1 upon winning a clash and on a successful hit. If at 0 at the end of the Scene, Angela's Qliphoth Counter increases by 2, and this character gains 2 Fragile next Scene. If at 1 or higher, Angela's Qliphoth Counter decreases by 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Parade
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever Emotion Level rises, gain 2 Stagger Fragile next Scene. After using a Combat Page, if the character has enough Emotion Points to raise Emotion Level at the end of the Scene, do that immediately instead. If the character wins the clash, loses the clash, or makes a successful hit 3 times in a row against the same target, inflict 2 Parade to target. (Resets when used against another target or different result occurs) Lose 1 stack at the end of the Scene. When the amount of stacks reaches 0, purge this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Key
BattleEffectText.Desc: Ability of 'Small Beak' Combat Page changes to '[On Play,][Return to Hand] Take 5% of Max. HP as damage; lower the Cost of pages in hand whose Cost is 1 or higher by 1 until they're used'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Key
BattleEffectText.Desc: If all five librarians have an Abnormality page, when using 'Twilight' E.G.O page, add a Blunt die (Roll: 1-4, Gain Power equal to Power Gain of all dice of all allies) to the dice queue.

BattleEffectText.Name: Key
BattleEffectText.Desc: When inflicting Fairy to the character with 'Intruder', apply +1 additional stack.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fanaticism
BattleEffectText.Desc: When a librarian uses 'Fanaticism' Combat Page, they take 8 damage and gain 1 Strength. If they do not have Abnormality pages, they additionally gain 1 Damage Up.
[On Hit] effects of the librarian's page targeting Speed die activate twice. (Once per librarian) Lose this status at the end of the Scene.
[On Hit] effects of the librarian's page targeting this Speed die activate twice. Lose this status at the end of the Scene.
[On Clash Win] and [On Hit] effects of the librarian's page targeting this Speed die activate twice. Lose this status at the end of the Scene.
[On Use], [On Clash Win], and [On Hit] effects of the librarian's page targeting this Speed die activate twice. Lose this status at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth X
BattleEffectText.Desc: When used, lower Qliphoth Counter by X.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - Changed by 0
BattleEffectText.Desc: Change the Cost of this page to a rnadom value between 0 and 3 until it's used.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - Changed by 1
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever user gains a positive status, recover 2 Stagger Resist.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - Changed by 2
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever user gains a positive status, give the same status effect to a random other ally as well, and they and user recover 2 Stagger Resist.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - Changed by 3 or More
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever user gains a positive status, give half of the same status effect (Rounded up) to all other allies, and all allies recover 2 HP and Stagger Resist.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the decks of Angela (Secretary) and Paradise in Full Bloom's Key pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: All Damage Down
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Offensive dice the character plays deal {0} less damage and Stagger damage. Can stack up to {1}.

BattleEffectText.Name: Flow Control Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: By putting this page in the deck, corresponding effects will be obtained at the start of the reception.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Meltdown (Enemy)
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, response success and response failure effects activate depending on the number of times the character is hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Meltdown (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the Scene, response success and response failure effects activate depending on the number of times the character is hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Status is given to 1 more ally.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 3 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Status is given to 2 more allies, and the number of times required for response failure is increased.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Status is given to 2 more targets, and effect changes depending on whether or not response has occured.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 3 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Number of times required for response success is halved.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase Qliphoth Counter by this ability by 1 more.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck and 3 or more Abnormality pages are selected
BattleEffectText.Desc: When using Instant page, restore 1 Light. (If target is an ally, they restore 1 Light too)

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 3 or More Copies in Deck and 5 or more Abnormality pages are selected
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lower the Cost of all pages by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Give 1 Endurance to all allies at the start of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 3 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Give 1 Strength to all allies at the start of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ordeal Combat Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Whenever Emotion Level rises, gain one of the Abnormality pages with the corresponding effect. Effect will be strengthened whenever the same page is gained. (Up to 2 times)

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 2 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Effect of this page is automatically strengthened whenever Emotion Level rises.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect - 3 or More Copies in Deck
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase the maximum amount of times the effect can be strengthened by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight E.G.O
BattleEffectText.Desc: At Emotion Level 4, obtain Combat Page with this effect. (Not treated as personal E.G.O page)

BattleEffectText.Name: Fixed Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: If 'Memory of Torment' if in the deck, it will be converted to the corresponding version regardless of the current floor.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unique E.G.O Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Act, this page will be moved to the alternative hand.
